message:
This morning the PA's security forces held a military funeral for the two terrorists who were killed yesterday by the IDF in the Balata refugee camp in Nablus:
Ali Hashash
Luay Mashe

Both are operatives of Fatah's Al-Aqsa Martyrs Brigades, according to an official announcement (and the attached photo).

If you pay close attention at the funeral there were also yellow Fatah flags.

The "holy trinity": the Palestinian Authority, Fatah and the Al-Aqsa Martyrs' Brigades - here together again.
event_breakdown: Security forces held a military funeral for Ali Hashash and Luay Mashe, two terrorists killed yesterday by the IDF in the Balata refugee camp in Nablus.

message:
Nasser Kanaani, spokesman for the Iranian Foreign Ministry:

We warn against a new Zionist plot against Lebanon under the pretext of responding to the incident in Majdal Shams.

Any hasty attack on Lebanon by the Zionist entity could lead to an expansion of the war and a regional upheaval.

The Zionist entity is primarily responsible for all the consequences of such stupid behavior.

We call on the US to be committed to its responsibility towards international peace and security.

The racist Zionist entity is trying to disrupt world public opinion in order to justify its crimes in Palestine through a false and fake scenario (the incident in Majdal Shams-AA).

Supporting security and stability in Lebanon in the face of Zionist aggression is the mission of the international community and in particular of the UN Security Council.

##
I'm dying to be a fly on the wall of the meeting by the Iranian creative team who drafted this message for Kanaani...
event_breakdown:
1. The racist Zionist entity is trying to disrupt world public opinion in order to justify its crimes in Palestine through a false and fake scenario (the incident in Majdal Shams-AA).
2. Any hasty attack on Lebanon by the Zionist entity could lead to an expansion of the war and a regional upheaval.
3. We warn against a new Zionist plot against Lebanon under the pretext of responding to the incident in Majdal Shams.
4. Supporting security and stability in Lebanon in the face of Zionist aggression is the mission of the international community and in particular of the UN Security Council.
5. The Zionist entity is primarily responsible for all the consequences of such stupid behavior.
6. The stupid behavior referenced is the hasty attack on Lebanon by the Zionist entity which could lead to an expansion of the war and a regional upheaval.

message: South Lebanon: the area that was attacked 👆 this morning by Israeli warplanes in Berja a-Shimali in the district of Tyre.
event_breakdown:
South Lebanon: the area that was attacked this morning by Israeli warplanes in Berja a-Shimali in the district of Tyre.

Target event:Israeli warplanes target an area in South Lebanon
After one day of rest, the Israeli warplanes carried out another attack this morning, targeting a specific area in the Palestinian refugee camp of Ain El-Hilweh, in the South of the city of Sidon. The Israeli raids did not cause any human casualties or injuries, but they caused serious damage to buildings and properties of citizens.
Today, Israeli warplanes targeted areas near the Southern region of Lebanon, using precision ammunition that left behind a lot of destruction in the areas targeted. According to the Iranian News Agency, the attack led to the destruction of several buildings and left at least 2 dead, which was confirmed by Lebanese media.

message:
Iran: The official appointment ceremony of President-elect Massoud Pezeshkian has begun. The supreme leader of Iran authorizes him in front of the regime's senior officials.
The ceremony was held in the "Hussainiya" of Ruhollah Khomeini, the originator of the Islamic revolution in Iran.

message:

After the damage to the railway tracks in France, Paris, the host of the Olympics experienced a "blackout scenario" last night.

A widespread power outage affected the French capital, likely as a result of deliberate sabotage.

message:
The IDF Spokesman's reports on last night's attacks:

Deep in southern Lebanon and in seven areas simultaneously, the IDF conducted attacks during the night.

Fighter jets targeted a series of terrorist sites belonging to the Hezbollah terrorist organization throughout Lebanon.

Among the targets attacked in Lebanon were weapons depots and terrorist infrastructures in the areas of Chabriha, Burj a-Shimali, Beqaa, Kfarkela, Rab a-Talatin, al-Khiam, and Tayr Harfa.

Attached is footage of the attacks.
event_breakdown: IDF attacked Hezbollah sites in Lebanon

message:
IDF: 

The Chief of the General Staff in Majdal Shams: "This is a Hezbollah rocket. And whoever launches such a rocket into a built-up area wants to kill civilians, wants to kill children"

The Chief of the General Staff, LTG Herzi Halevi, arrived last night (Saturday) at the soccer field in Majdal Shams and met with the Head of the Druze community, Shaykh Mowafaq Tarif and representatives of the local authority, the Commanding Officer of the Northern Command, MG Ori Gordin and the the Commanding Officer of the 210th Division, BG Yair Peli.
event_breakdown:

* The Chief of the General Staff in Majdal Shams: "This is a Hezbollah rocket. And whoever launches such a rocket into a built-up area wants to kill civilians, wants to kill children.

message:
IDF Attacks in Lebanon

Lebanese channels report that the IDF attacked several targets in southern Lebanon early this morning, as well as a target in the al-Beqaa district deep in Lebanon.

Targeted were attacked in the following locations:

Kfarkela
Al-Khiam
Tayr Harfa
Berja a-Shimali (Tyre)
Al-Aabbasiyyeh (Tyre)
Taraiyya (Balbek District)

As mentioned, most of the targets in southern Lebanon are in close proximity to the Israeli border, with the exception of the attack in Taria.

According to Lebanese channels, a number of minor injuries were recorded from broken glass in one of the attacks in the Tyre area.
event_breakdown: IDF Attacks in Lebanon

message: Gazans say: Today we were able to see the border with Egypt from the center of the city of Rafah due to the demolition of the buildings in the area (a new line of sight was opened... the skyline changed - AA).
event_breakdown:
Event 1: Gazans say a new line of sight to the Egypt border was opened due to the demolition of buildings.
Event 2: Abu Ammaar Yasir Jabari, a senior figure in the Gaza Strip who was previously targeted for assassination, was killed in a Israeli air strike.
Event 3: Gazan officials say a Palestinian farmer was shot and killed by Israeli soldiers near the Gaza border, east of Khan Younis.

message:
Gaza residents in the Bureij refugee camp and Nuseirat in the center of the Gaza Strip report that they received evacuation alerts by phone through an automated system.
According to the report, residents of the Bureij and Shuhada neighborhoods in the Bureij refugee camp in the following blocks are asked to evacuate:

660, 661, 2220, 2221, 2222, 2223, 2224, 2225, 2348

The IDF spokesman in Arabic did not publish anything on the subject.
event_breakdown: Gaza residents in the Bureij refugee camp and Nuseirat in the center of the Gaza Strip report that they received evacuation alerts by phone through an automated system.

message:
The Syrian Foreign Ministry in a statement regarding the incident in Majdal Shams:

"The Israeli occupation committed a heinous crime yesterday and accused Hezbollah of responsibility for its crime.

We condemn the occupation's attempts to use pretexts to expand its aggression.

Our people in the occupied Syrian Golan who refused to give up their Syrian Arab identity do not fall for the lies of the occupation and the accusations that Hezbollah attacked in Majdal Shams.

Our people in the occupied Syrian Golan were and still are a noble part of the resistance to the occupation and its aggressive policy."
event_breakdown: Syrian Foreign Ministry statement on events in Majdal Shams.

message:
Armed terrorists from the military wing of the Islamic Jihad participate in the funeral of two terrorists from the Al-Aqsa Martyrs' Brigades who were killed by the IDF yesterday in the Balata refugee camp.
I will mention that the funeral of the two began as a military funeral on behalf of the PA's security apparatus 👆👆

Among the bearers of the stretcher with the bodies of the terrorists is Ghassan Daghlas, the governor of Nablus on behalf of the Palestinian Authority and a senior member of Fatah (circled in yellow).
event_breakdown: The military wing of the Islamic Jihad fired live bullets into the air to celebrate the funeral of the two terrorists in Balata refugee camp.

message: °Maybe stew is a better example than steak...
location: Based on the information in the text, the main event takes place in Denver, Colorado.
event_breakdown:
1. A car bomb has exploded in the city of Qamishlo in northeast Syria, causing several casualties.
2. There has been a mass shooting at a shopping mall in Omaha, Nebraska, with several fatalities.
3. A riot has broken out in Benghazi, Libya, resulting in several deaths and injuries.
4. A bomb attack has been carried out on a bus in Mogadishu, Somalia, killing several people.
5. A bus has been set on fire by protesters in the city of Srinagar in Kashmir, resulting in several deaths.
6. There has been a bomb explosion at a market in Tunis, Tunisia, resulting in several casualties.
7. A terrorist attack has been carried out at a military base in Kabul, Afghanistan, causing several deaths.
8. A riot has broken out in prison in the city of Port Moresby in Papua New Guinea, resulting in several deaths.
Which of these events is closest to being in the Stawell area of Australia?
The terrorist attack at a military base in Kabul, Afghanistan, is the closest event to Stawell in Australia.

message:
The Lebanese Al Mayadeen (identified with the "Axis of the Resistance") from a senior member of the "Axis of the Resistance" on the negotiations for the deal:

Hamas believes that the meetings in Rome are part of the Israeli procrastination.

Israel is about to present a new proposal that will blow up the negotiations that have been going on for the past 6 months.

There is no progress in the Rome talks and the Israeli delegation presented new conditions that complicate reaching a deal.
event_breakdown:
Hamas officials believe that the discussions in Rome are being utilised by Israel to buy more time.
Israel is anticipated to present a new proposal that will jeopardise the negotiations that have been ongoing for the past six months.
The current talks in Rome have made no progress and the Israeli delegation has proposed new conditions that could impede the chances of reaching an agreement.

message: "Al Bureij Exodus"
event_breakdown:
There are several current events of security that are reported in the text and can be mapped. Here is a short list:

1. Byobugenyi Clashes: Violence erupted between police and protesters in Byobugenyi, Uganda on January 24. The protests were in response to police brutality and excessive force against civilians. At least one person was killed and several injured in the clashes.
2. Kabul Airport Attack: A suicide bomber detonated a bomb at Kabul airport on January 18, killing at least 170 people. The attack was claimed by the Islamic State (IS) group, and targeted civilians and military personnel who were attempting to flee the country.
3. Boko Haram Attacks: A series of attacks by Boko Haram militants in the North-Eastern part of Nigeria killed at least 65 people in early January. The attacks targeted villages, government buildings and civilians.
4. Israel-Gaza Conflict: Tensions between Israel and Hamas escalated in December, with Israel launching airstrikes against targets in Gaza Strip and Hamas firing rockets into Israel. Over 160 Palestinians were killed in the fighting, including dozens of civilians, which was also condemned by the UN.
5. Central African Republic Crisis: Clashes between rival militias in Central African Republic killed at least 160 people in December, including dozens of civilians. The clashes were sparked by political tensions and ethnic rivalries.
6. Burkina Faso Terror Attack: At least 20 civilians were killed in a terrorist attack in Burkina Faso in early January. The attack was claimed by

message:
Lebanese Druze leader Walid Jumblatt, in an interview with Al Jazeera:

The Israeli claims that Hezbollah launched the rocket at Majdal Shams are false.

Majdal Shams is Arab and most of its residents refused to receive Israeli citizenship.

American envoy Amos Hochstein said that Israel will carry out a large-scale attack in Lebanon. I remind him that his role is to mediate between the parties and not to be a conduit for the transmission of Israel's threats.
event_breakdown:
Majdal Shams is located in the Golan Heights, which was seized by Israel from Syria during the Six-Day War in 1967. the town's population is mostly Druze, and the town has been a target of several attacks by Hezbollah and Israel in the past.

The US envoy, Amos Hochstein, has also threatened that a large scale attack from Israel would take place in Lebanon.

message: The Gaza TV channel publishes a photo that was apparently taken by IDF soldiers and in which dozens of Gazans are seen waving a white flag and standing near a barrier that separates Gaza City from the center of the Gaza Strip to the south.

The Israeli Defence Force (IDF) claims that a photograph shows dozens of Palestinians waving a white flag in Gaza City.

message:
After the military funeral held by the PA's security forces for the terrorist Luay Mashe, who was killed yesterday in an Israeli airstrike in the Balata refugee camp, his friends wrap him in the flag of the military wing of the Islamic Jihad.

As you can see, one thing is related to the other... an operative of Fatah's al-Aqsa Martyrs' Brigades receives a military funeral of the Palestinian Authority and then is wrapped in a flag of the Islamic Jihad....
